Title: Siya's portfolio
Name: Siyanda Makhalima
Description: My passion and interest  in software development is the opportunity to create something that has the potential to be used by millions of people and change their lives.
AboutContent: I am a fullstack developer who is proactive. I mainly code in Javascript and use ReactJs framework for the frontend. I have more experience working in the backend but can also work on the frontend as long there is a design :)

I started my career in 2019 working for a startup called Uber5 in Cape Town. In the company I was doing almost everything from backend to frontend and also some Devops. I have experience working with React native and wordpress.
WorkContent: These are the projects I have worked on. Some are mine and some are projectes I freelance on:
